resources.string: No pictures are available on the phone.
Calls are sent directly to voicemail.
Only display contacts that have phone numbers
Error, unable to save contact changes.
Sync your Google contacts! \nAfter syncing to your phone, your contacts will be available to you wherever you go.

"You don't have any contacts.

To add contacts, press Menu and select:
 

New contact to create a new contact from scratch
 

Import contacts to add contacts from your SIM card

"You don't have any favorites.
 
To add a contact to your list of favorites:
 

Touch Contacts
 

Touch the contact you want to add to your favorites
 

Touch the star next to the contact's name
